rules_text:
Effigy [i](As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a token that shares a card type with it. If you do, this spell costs {2} less to cast.)[/i]
Menace
When this creature dies, create two 1/1 black Horror creature tokens and a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
